content.text:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As a senior Elementary School Teacher, I will:

1. Familiarize myself with all school policies and rules
2. Consistently apply policies to all students fairly
3. Clearly communicate expectations to students and parents
4. Use appropriate disciplinary measures when rules are broken
5. Document policy violations and actions taken
6. Collaborate with administration on policy enforcement
7. Participate in policy review and updates as needed
8. Model adherence to school rules and policies
9. Provide positive reinforcement for rule compliance
10. Address policy questions from students and parents promptly
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
